title: All the hard work has been done.
subtitle: Join our highly secure distributed infrastructure by providing storage space. Get paid by Internxt customers directly in INXT. By joining our network you will be able to monetize that space by hosting users encrypted data.
subtitle2: Hosts receive a 10% payout boost by holding Internxt tokens. Additionally, a minimum of 30 INXT is needed to get paid when 2 TB of data are stored. Providers hosting over 2 TB will also receive free merch once a year, and 20% discount in all our subscriptions. Not compatible with other offers/discounts.

title: Earn Interest on your Inxt tokens.
subtitle: Stake or hold your Internxt tokens to earn interest each month.
subtitle2: The highest staking rates avaiable on the market today.
subtitle3: It's super simple. All you need are INXT and an active Internxt lifetime membership. Not compatible with other offers/discounts
subtitle4: The more liquidity you add, the more you will earn.

title: Easy and secure way to store Inxt
subtitle: Store your inxt within the Coinbase Wallet iOS or Android app.
subtitle2: Connect your Coinbase Wallet on Uniswap by using the WalletLink feature in settings on the app and scan the QR code. Your tokens will then be avaiable to trade on Uniswap.

title: INXT Data Boost
subtitle: Get up to 2TB additional free storage when holding INXT.
subtitle2: Get 1 GB of additional storage for every 10 Internxt tokens held. Applicable to all paid subscriptions. Maximum additional storage is capped at x2 of the active plan.
subtitle3: For instance, if you have an active 200 GB subscription, you can add up to 200 GB additional storage capacity by holding INXT. This would upgrade your 200 GB plan to a 400 GB plan.
subtitle4: Send us an email and claim your Boost!
